options.title: -c
options.description: clear the directory stack by deleting all of the elements

options.title: -l
options.description: do not print tilde-prefixed versions of directories relative to your home directory

options.title: -p
options.description: print the directory stack with one entry per line

options.title: -v
options.description: print the directory stack with one entry per line prefixed with its position in the stack

options.title: -N
options.description: Displays the Nth entry counting from the right of the list shown by dirs when invoked without options, starting with zero.
